import React,{useRef}from'react';import RcTooltip from'rc-tooltip';import{useVitessceContainer}from'../hooks';/**
 * This is a small wrapper around the Tooltip component from the rc-tooltip library,
 * which is required to be able to apply theme styles to the tooltip.

 * @param {object} props Props are passed through to the <RcTooltip/> from the library.
 */export default function HelpTooltip(props){var title=props.title,content=props.content,overlayClassName=props.overlayClassName;var spanRef=useRef();var getTooltipContainer=useVitessceContainer(spanRef);var overlay=title||content;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{ref:spanRef}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(RcTooltip,Object.assign({getTooltipContainer:getTooltipContainer,overlayClassName:overlayClassName,overlay:overlay},props)));}HelpTooltip.defaultProps={overlayClassName:'help-tooltip',placement:'top',trigger:'hover',mouseEnterDelay:0.2,mouseLeaveDelay:0};
